did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Minute Book of the Yavapai County Dairymen's Association, 1922-1924
did.abstract: The Yavapai County Dairymen's Association was an organization formed by Charles U. Pickrell, Yavapai County farm agent, of dairymen and others interested in the sale of milk in the Prescott, Ariz. area. Holograph notebook of meeting minutes concerning organization, election of officers, projects, and business.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Organization formed by Charles U. Pickrell, Yavapai County farm agent, of dairymen and others interested in the sale of milk in the Prescott, Ariz. area.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Holograph notebook of meeting minutes concerning organization, election of officers, projects, and business.
